docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Regis

A fully functional Group Management Bot with Auto Filter and File Store Feature.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Admin Commands
  • Blocking (tmute, mute, kick)
  • ids and User info
  • Group Management (pin, purge, kick etc..)
  • Broadcast
  • Quote Broadcast (/qbroadcast)
  • Individual Settings for each groups
  • MAINTENANCE MODE: When enabled, bot will tell everyone that maintenance is going on.
  • Users who banned bot, will be deleted automatically from db.
  • Logs of pending requests
  • Filter (Manual & Auto)
  • Manual filter supports fillings.
  • File Store
  • Inline Search (ADMINS Exclusive)
  • IMDB poster search
  • IMDB search
  • Random pics
  • Telegraph
  • Sharable link
  • Link shortner
  • Text to speech
  • Url Shortner
  • Log of files taken by users.
  • Improved spellCheck A.I, Now it's more practical.
  • PM guide.
  • FUTURE PLAN: Improve PM guide to enable or disable PM result.
  • Many others coming.....

docs.title: Available Bot commands
docs.text: Command Description /logs Get recent errors. /stats Get the status of files in the database. /filter Add manual filters. /filters View added filters. /connect Connect to PM. /disconnect Disconnect from PM. /del <filter> Delete a specific filter. /delall Delete all filters. /deleteall Delete all indexed files (autofilter). /delete <file> Delete a specific file from the index. /info Get user information. /id Get Telegram IDs. /imdb Fetch information from IMDB. /users Get a list of all users and their IDs. /chats Get a list of all chats and their IDs. /index Add files from a channel. /leave Make the bot leave a chat. /disable Disable a chat. /enable Re-enable a chat. /ban_user <user> Ban a user. /unban <user> Unban a user. /channels Get a list of all connected channels. /broadcast <message> Broadcast a message to all users (without quote). /qbroadcast <message> Broadcast a message to all users (with quote). /batch Create a link for multiple posts. /links Create a link for a single post. /telegraph Upload media (less than 5MB) to Telegraph. /share Get a shareable link for any text or URL. /tmute <time> Temporarily mute a user.

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text:
Development stopped

  • Pyrogram is no longer maintained.
  • Porting to telethon may be done in future, not in my priority list now.
  • Also this was my 1st project, code is messy. So porting will be extremely time consuming.

docs.title: Deploy Methods
docs.text:
To VPS or LocalTo Heroku
  1. Clone Repo: 
    git clone https://github.com/soymadip/Regis

  2. Get the .env file

    curl -L https://soymadip.github.io/Regis/env -o .env

  3. Edit .env file with required options. See below for more config options.

    nano .env

  4. Install Packages

    pip3 install -r requirements.txt

  5. Run Regis

    python3 bot.py

You can quickly deploy Regis to Heroku using the below button.

Configuration options can be found below.

docs.title: Configuration Options
docs.text:
Below are the available configuration variables/options & their descriptions:

Info

Default values can be found here.

docs.title: Bot Credentials
docs.text: Variable Description Required BOT_TOKEN Create a bot using @BotFather & get the Telegram API token. Yes API_ID Get this value from telegram.org. Yes API_HASH Get this value from telegram.org. Yes

docs.title: User & Admin
docs.text: Variable Description Required ADMINS Username or ID of the admin(s). Separate multiple admins by space. Yes AUTH_USERS Restricts the use of inline queries to specified users. Add user IDs separated by space. Yes CHANNELS Username or ID of channels/groups from which to save media for the DB. Separate multiple IDs by space. Yes AUTH_CHANNEL ID of channel for forced subscription. Users must join this channel to use the bot. No AUTH_GROUPS Group IDs for authentication purposes. Format: space-separated integers. No UPSTREAM_REPO If you want to use a customized fork, set this variable to the GitHub URL of your fork. No MAINTENANCE_MODE Set to True or False. If True, the bot will operate in maintenance mode. No

docs.title: DB & Storage
docs.text: Variable Description Required DATABASE_URI MongoDB URI. Get this from your MongoDB dashboard or connection string. Yes DATABASE_NAME Name of the database in MongoDB. Yes COLLECTION_NAME Name of the collection. Use different collection names for each bot if sharing a database. Yes LOG_CHANNEL A channel ID to log the activities of the bot. Make sure the bot is an admin in the channel. Yes FILE_STORE_CHANNEL Channel ID(s) where file store links of posts should be made. Separate multiple IDs by space. Yes PUBLIC_FILE_STORE Set to True or False. If False, your bot cannot be used as a file storage bot by others. No PROTECT_CONTENT Set to True or False. If True, files from the bot cannot be forwarded to any chat. No INDEX_REQ_CHANNEL Channel ID where index requests are sent. Defaults to LOG_CHANNEL if not specified. No CACHE_TIME Time in seconds for caching inline query results. Default is 300. No SESSION Name for the Pyrogram session. Default is 'Regis'. No

docs.title: Bot Settings
docs.text: Variable Description Required CAPTION_FILTER Set to True or False. When enabled, the bot will also match search terms in file captions. No SUPPORT_CHAT Username or link of your support chat (without @) where Users will be directed here for help. No PICS Telegraph links of images to show in the start message. Multiple images can be used, separated by spaces. No P_TTI_SHOW_OFF Set to True or False. If True, users will be redirected to send /start to the bot's PM else, files will be sent directly to users' PM. No IMDB Set to True or False. Enable or disable IMDB data in search results. No LONG_IMDB_DESCRIPTION Set to True or False. If enabled, the long IMDB story will be used instead of short desc. No IMDB_TEMPLATE Custom template for displaying IMDB data. Available fields depend on movie metadata. No SPELL_CHECK_REPLY Set to True or False. If enabled, the bot will suggest related files whenever message is posted in grp. No SINGLE_BUTTON Set to True or False. If True, file name & file size will be shown in a single button instead of 2 separate buttons. No CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION Custom caption template for files. Available variables: {file_name}, {file_size}, {file_caption}. No BATCH_FILE_CAPTION Custom caption template for batch files. If not set, will use CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION instead. No MAX_LIST_ELM Maximum number of elements to show in lists like cast, genre etc. Integer value (e.g., 10). No WELCOM_NEW_USERS Set to True or False. If False, the bot will not welcome new users in groups. No WELCOM_NEW_TEXT Custom welcome message for new users. Available variables: {mention}, {chat}. No IGNORE_WORDS Words to ignore in search queries. Separate multiple words with | (pipe symbol). No CUSTOM_FOOTER Custom footer text to be displayed in messages. No PM_FILTER Set to True or False. If True, enables filtering in private messages. No AUTO_MESSAGE_DELETE_TIME Time in seconds after which bot messages are auto-deleted. Set to 0 to disable. No
